description: Detects execution of executables that can be used to bypass Applocker whitelisting Author: juju4. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: False positives depend on scripts and administrative tools used in the monitored environment
Using installutil to add features for .NET applications (primarily would occur in developer environments)
name: Possible Applocker Bypass
query: process.command_line:(*\\msdt.exe* OR *\\installutil.exe* OR *\\regsvcs.exe* OR *\\regasm.exe* OR *\\msbuild.exe* OR *\\ieexec.exe*)
